layout.singingstanza: In -- deed the for -- mer things have come to pass, And new things I am tell -- ing you; In -- deed the for -- mer things have come to pass, And new things I am tell -- ing you; Be -- fore they spring forth I will let you hear them. Be -- fore they spring forth I will let you hear them. For -- get -- ting the things which are be -- hind And stretch -- ing for -- ward to the things Which are be -- fore, I pur -- sue toward the goal for the prize which God has called me up -- ward in Christ.

lyrics.stanza: Before they spring forth I will let you hear them. Before they spring forth I will let you hear them.
Forgetting the things which are behind And stretching forward to the things Which are before, I pursue toward the goal for the prize Which God has called me upward in Christ.
(All three stanzas can be sung simultaneously.)
